4.title: Top Trade Volume by Account ID
4.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| summarize Total = count(), by:{accountId = toString(accountId)}
| fieldsAdd accountId = replaceString(accountId, ".0", "")
| sort Total, direction:"descending"
| limit 10

5.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy"
| filter isNotNull(amount) 
| summarize BuyTotal = count()

6.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount) 
| summarize SellTotal = count()

7.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| summarize BuyTradeVolume =  sum(amount*price)

8.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount) 
| summarize SellTradeVolume =  sum(amount*price)

9.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| summarize BuyTrades = count(), BuyTradeVolume = sum((amount)*(price))
| fields BuyTradeAvg = BuyTradeVolume/BuyTrades

10.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount) 
| summarize SellTrades = count(), SellTradeVolume = sum((amount)*(price))
| fields SellTradeAvg = SellTradeVolume/SellTrades

11.title: Trades by TradeType
11.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| parse event.type, " ('com.easytrade.long-'|'com.easytrade.quick-') STRING:tradeType"
| makeTimeseries totalTrades = count(), by:{tradeType}

12.title: Volume by TradeType (Total)
12.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| parse event.type, " ('com.easytrade.long-'|'com.easytrade.quick-') STRING:tradeType"
| fieldsAdd totalTradeAmount = (amount*price)
| makeTimeseries TradeVolume = Sum(totalTradeAmount), by:{tradeType}

13.title: Volume by TradeType  (Avg)
13.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| parse event.type, " ('com.easytrade.long-'|'com.easytrade.quick-') STRING:tradeType"
| fieldsAdd totalTradeAmount = (amount*price)
| makeTimeseries TradeVolumeAvg = avg(totalTradeAmount), by:{tradeType}

21.title: Latency (Avg)
21.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:tradeType"
| makeTimeseries ResponseTimeAvg = avg(duration), by:{tradeType}

22.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| summarize BuyLatencyAvg = round(avg(duration),decimals:2)
//| fields Status = concat((BuyLatencyAvg)," ms ")

23.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| summarize SellLatencyAvg = round(avg(duration),decimals:2)
//| fields Status = concat((SellLatencyAvg)," ms ")

24.title: Time from deposit to first Sell
24.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit"
| fieldsAdd deposit_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_asset_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell", toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_deposit_ts = takeFirst(deposit_ts), first_sell_asset_ts = takeFirst(sell_asset_ts), by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd time_from_deposit_to_first_sell = (first_sell_asset_ts - first_deposit_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_deposit_to_first_sell > 5
| limit 8
| fields AccountID = accountId, time_from_deposit_to_first_sell, alias:{Seconds} 
| sort Seconds desc

25.title: Most recent trades
25.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter (event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell")
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| filterOut isNull(trace_id)
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.long-' STRING:TradeType"
| fieldsAdd sla = if(duration > 23, "🔴", else: "🟢")
| fields {timestamp, alias:Time}, AccountID = accountId, TradeType, Amount = amount, Price = price, TotalVolume = round(amount * price, decimals:2),trace_id
| sort Time,  direction:"descending"
| limit 10

26.title: Top increase in value by Account ID
26.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.withdraw" or event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit"
| fieldsAdd amount_withdrawal = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.withdraw", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| fieldsAdd amount_deposit = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.deposit", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| summarize {total_withdrawals = sum(amount_withdrawal), total_deposits = sum(amount_deposit)}, by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd BalanceChange = round(total_deposits - total_withdrawals,decimals:2)
| filter BalanceChange > 0.0
| fields AccountID = accountId, BalanceChange
| sort BalanceChange, direction:"descending"
| limit 8

28.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" 
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| summarize slaPercentage=round(toDouble(countIf(sla == "Met"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd slaStatus = if(slaPercentage <= 95, "NotMet ❌ ", else:"Met ✅ ")
| fields Status = concat((slaPercentage), "% ", (slaStatus))

30.title: Sell SLA status
30.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| makeTimeseries  Met = countIf(sla == "Met"), notMet = countIf(sla == "NotMet"),interval:5m

31.title: Time to Mouth SLA status
31.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| makeTimeseries  Met = countIf(sla == "Met"), notMet = countIf(sla == "NotMet"), interval:5m

32.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell"
| filter isNotNull(duration)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(duration > 23, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| summarize slaPercentage=round(toDouble(countIf(sla == "Met"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd slaStatus = if(slaPercentage <= 95, "NotMet ❌ ", else:"Met ✅ ")
| fields Status = concat((slaPercentage), "% ", (slaStatus))

33.title: Problems

37.title: Top Trade Dollar Volume by Account ID
37.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter matchesValue(event.provider, "www.easytrade.com")
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.long-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-buy" or event.type == "com.easytrade.long-sell" or event.type == "com.easytrade.quick-sell"
| filter isNotNull(amount)
| fieldsAdd totalTradeAmount = (toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price))
| summarize Total = Sum(totalTradeAmount), by:{accountId = toString(accountId)}
| fieldsAdd accountId = replaceString(accountId, ".0", "")
| sort Total, direction:"descending"
| limit 10
